detaileddescription.para: I2CSlave_CMD_* macros are general command codes for I2CSlave_control(). Not all I2CSlave driver implementations support these command codes.
I2CSLAVEMSP432_CMD_* macros are command codes only defined in the I2CSlaveMSP432.h driver implementation and need to: #include<ti/drivers/i2cslave/I2CSlaveMSP432.h>
